meta.name: description
meta.content: Southern Lehigh School District in Center Valley, PA provides an educational program known for its excellence and forward-looking perspective, which is sensitive to the changing needs of its students.

meta.content: Southern Lehigh school district, SLSD, Southern Lehigh, Lehigh County, Center Valley, Hopewell, Liberty Bell, Lower Milford.

a.span: Free ebooks available to Southern Lehigh Students

div.p: Because of the K-12 1:1 initiative, the Southern Lehigh school district librarians would like to remind you of a FREE and user friendly source for ebooks. Overdrive allows students to borrow ebooks and audiobooks, similar to borrowing materials in the school library, without the worry of due dates, fines and replacements costs. We encourage you to take advantage of this resource.

a.title: Go to comments for Free ebooks available to Southern Lehigh Students
